block_comment: The given Verilog code block controls the resetting of a byte counter. The "assign" keyword is employed to set the variable "ResetByteCnt" to the value of "RxEndFrm". When the variable "RxEndFrm" is high, this indicates the end of a frame in the received data, triggering the "ResetByteCnt" to reset or initialize the byte count to prepare for counting the bytes of the next data frame.
